faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Explore the ACTUS App and Its Features

questions.question: What is the ACTUS app, and what does it offer?
questions.answer: The ACTUS app provides users with an engaging platform that rewards activities through points. Users can earn points by browsing offers, making purchases, participating in events, and engaging in mini-games. These points can be redeemed for rewards such as discount coupons, exclusive content, and profile customization.

questions.question: How do I earn points and cash back in the ACTUS app?
questions.answer:
There are several ways to earn points and cash back:

• Browsing Offers: Spend 15 minutes exploring available offers to earn 15 points and receive cash back on your next purchase.
• Event Participation: Join webinars, workshops, or company-hosted events to earn 500 points along with cash back.
• Anniversary Quest: Make a purchase on your account anniversary to earn 300 points and enjoy cash back.
• Challenges and Mini-Games: Participate in challenges or play mini-games to earn additional points and cash back for your engagement.

questions.question: What rewards can I redeem using my points?
questions.answer:
Users can redeem points for:

• Discount Coupons (e.g., 5% discount for 1000 points)
• Profile Customization with avatars and themes
• Exclusive Content like tutorials and eBooks
• Access to VIP events and exclusive products
• Charitable Donations by converting points to donations

questions.question: How does the coupon sharing feature work?
questions.answer:
With the ACTUS app, users can:

• Share Coupons: Send coupons to other users on the map and split bills.
• Track Requests: Accept or deny sharing requests from other users.
• Navigate to Redemption Locations: Use route tracking to visit physical locations and redeem coupons.

questions.question: What are clan and team activities in the ACTUS app?
questions.answer:
Users can join or form clans, where they:

• Upgrade Clan Features: Use points to unlock exclusive clan events and storage options.
• Participate in Challenges: Compete in clan-specific competitions to win grand prizes.
• Organize Trips and Events: Plan trips with clan members for fun and rewards.

questions.question: How do map-based offers work?
questions.answer:
The ACTUS app integrates a map feature that:

• Detects your location and displays nearby brands offering discounts.
• Displays popups with each brand’s highest discount.
• Allows filtering of brands based on categories, such as food or retail.
• Provides coupon details, including validity, discount type, and usage limits.
